text: Rushell Clayton (born 18 October 1992) is a Jamaican athlete specialising in the 400 metres hurdles. She won the bronze medal at the 2019 World Championships, setting her personal best of 53.74 seconds and at the 2019 Pan American Games. Rushell is coached by Okiele Stewart and is a part of JAD Professional Management. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=2|2011 |CARIFTA Games (U20) |Montego Bay, Jamaica |4th |400 m hurdles |59.35 |- |Pan American Games |Guadalajara, Mexico |12th (h) |400 m hurdles |63.44 |- |rowspan=2|2014 |rowspan=2|NACACU23 Championships |rowspan=2|Kamloops, Canada |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |400 m hurdles |63.68 |- |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |4 × 100 m relay |45.90 |- |2015 |NACAC Championships |San José, Costa Rica |9th (h) |400 m hurdles |57.71 |- |2018 |Central American and Caribbean Games |Barranquilla, Colombia |4th |400 m hurdles |55.30 |- |rowspan=2|2019 |Pan American Games |Lima, Peru |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |400 m hurdles |55.53 |- |World Championships |Doha, Qatar |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |400 m hurdles |53.74 PB |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Jamaican female hurdlers Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2011 Pan American Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games competitors for Jamaica Category:World Athletics Championships athletes for Jamaica Category:World Athletics Championships medalists Category:Pan American Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Jamaica
